attributes.action: Ensure that genuine 4x4 users who use LPG instead of petrol/diesel are not penalised excessively with respect to Vehicle Road Tax change by allowing proof LPG conversion or ownership certificate to continue with the current level of Vehicle Road Tax because the LPG produces less emissions than standard vehicles therefore being green
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair that LPG 4x4 users are penalised when their vehicle is actually more green and produces less emissions than a standard vehicle.  A lot of 4x4 users have taken the time to convert their vehicle from petrol or diesel to LPG, which costs them around £2000.  Therefore they should not be penalised when the road tax is increasing due to 4x4 large emissions when these vehicles actually produce less emissions than the standard vehicle.
